response.overview: In the vibrant heart of Los Angeles, Grace, a young woman with a seemingly perfect life, begins to receive mysterious packages each Saturday, each one more bizarre than the last. These unexpected deliveries disrupt her routine and unearth hidden anxieties, leading her down a dark path of self-discovery. As Grace grapples with the chaos in her life, her mental state spirals, pushing her to confront her inner demons.  The climax of her unraveling occurs when the final package arrivesâ€”an unmarked box containing a gun. Faced with a life-altering decision, Grace must choose between succumbing to despair or embracing the unknown to reclaim her identity.
response.title: Sender Unknown
